Samples.Name: ResponsiveGridView
Samples.About: Presents content within a GridView to fill the total available display space. It reacts to changes in the layout as well as the content so it can adapt to different form factors automatically.

Samples.Name: VariableSizedGridView
Samples.About: Displays items that have different Width and Height values. You can control the number of rows, columns, orientation, and aspect ratio.

Samples.Name: Carousel
Samples.About: A responsive carousel control for displaying content. You can control properties like the AspectRatio, MaxItems, MinHeight, MaxHeight, GradientOpacity and AlignmentX.

Samples.Name: HamburgerMenu
Samples.About: The HamburgerMenu provides a simple to use side bar menu that you can show/hide using a hamburger button.

Samples.Name: RangeSelector
Samples.About: The RangeSelector is a "double slider" control for range values.

Samples.Name: ImageEx
Samples.About: Images are downloaded asynchronously showing a load indicator. Source images are then stored in the App local cache to preserve resources and load time.

Samples.Name: HeaderedTextBlock
Samples.About: The HeaderedTextBlock control is designed to provide a header for read only text. This control is useful for displaying read only forms.

Samples.Name: RadialGauge
Samples.About: The radial gauge displays a value within a range, using a needle on a circular face.

Samples.Name: SlidableListItem
Samples.About: A UI control that enables actions to be triggered by sliding the content left or right. In most cases, it will be used as a ListView DataTemplate root similar to email apps, but it is not required.

Samples.Name: PullToRefreshListView
Samples.About: PullToRefreshListView is derived from the built in ListView in the Universal Windows Platform. It enables the popular Pull To Refresh pattern.

Samples.Name: WeatherLiveTileAndToast
Samples.About: This shows how to send a Weather Live Tile notification, displaying the forecast.

Samples.Name: Bing Service
Samples.About: The Bing Service allows you to retrieve Microsoft Bing web search engine results.

Samples.Name: Facebook Service
Samples.About: The Facebook Service allows you to retrieve or publish data to Facebook graph.

Samples.Name: Twitter Service
Samples.About: The Twitter Service allows you to retrieve or publish data to Twitter.
